work_experience.text:
- 2015 (2 years)

Acquired new customers for various Fortune 100 and 500 clients through a direct approach sales system.

Conducted preliminary, secondary, and final interviews for applicants. Responsible for training entry-level employees, as well as managing a team of 5-10 people on a daily basis.

Learned the in's and outs of small business management, developed strong sales skills via building rapore, trust, and finding value; learned how to effectively and efficiently manage a team of coworkers.

(2 years 3 months)

Oversaw many day to day operational tasks within the company, ranging from, but not limited to managing summer internships, running payroll, and tracking all financial credits and debits.

Page2

Responsible for organizing the companies financial system, to ensure efficiency. Finalized multiple deals to license Faniums tweet feeder API to partners within the Fantasy Space.

Developed strong organizational skills, an ability to manage a team, and gained extensive experience working with QuickBooks, excel, and other payroll systems.

work_experience.Experience:
Senior Consultant at Beacon Hill Staffing Group - Pharma Division May 2016 - Present (3 months)

From staff augmentation and project/business specific solutions to direct (permanent) placement services, Beacon Hill Pharma’s dedicated team of recruiting and staffing experts consistently delivers quality professionals on a time-sensitive basis.

Specialties: Specialize in all levels of Clinical Research, Medical Directors, Project Management, Data Management, Biometrics, Drug Safety, Medical Writing, Regulatory Affairs, Quality, Document Management, Medical Affairs, core platform functions, executive placements, and pharmaceutical recruiter placement.
